snippet: Even though New York City’s 16-ounce limit on sodas does not take effect until March, the new arena decided to observe it immediately.
abstract: Barclays Center, home to the Brooklyn Nets, will now serve as an 18,000-seat petri dish for a nationally watched social experiment--what happens when big appetites bump up against New York City's rules limiting the sale of sugary drinks to 16 ounces.
lead_paragraph: Even though New York City’s 16-ounce limit on sodas does not take effect until March, the new arena decided to observe it immediately.

headline.seo: Bloomberg Soda Limits Tested at Barclays Center
headline.main: New Brooklyn Arena Serves as a Test: Will Fans Accept Smaller Sodas?
headline.print_headline: New Brooklyn Arena Serves as a Test: Will Fans Accept Smaller Sodas?
